api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of all available bike sharing networks.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

api_list.api_description: Get schedule data for a specified date range or current day.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Start date for the schedule search

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: End date for the schedule search

query: Can you list all the bike-sharing networks available right now? Also, could you provide the NHL schedule for the dates 9/25/2023-9/28/2023?
